lines: Some say the Rangers are the real defenders of Bree, but why don't we ever see them defend us then?
I've heard rumours of a great evil that has returned in the East. I hope it stays away from Bree.
We've been getting more reports of Orcs in the Lone-lands.
Last week I had the gatekeeper shift. I hope I never have to do that again.
My brother is a gatekeeper, my father was a proud guard too. We are all guards in my family.
I don't think there is any town as great as Bree.
Do you plan to visit the Colonies? I heard they have good food there.
Our men are strong and stalwart - but if them Black Riders come into Bree again I don't know what we'll do! They came with an unnatural chill that shook the hearts of even the bravest men!
I'm worried about these ruffians that keep coming into Bree, if you ask me, we ought to chase them out before they take over!
Nothing to see here, just go about your business.
Stay on the roads. Things lurk in the dark.
Stay on the roads, friend. Things lurk in the dark.
Them Black Riders will know better than to mess with us now that you're here, #p!
Glad to have you among us, #p!
Can't you see I'm busy!
Die! Die! Die!
For Bree!
Why don't you give me a hand?
We fight! For Bree!
Been a while since I've had a good brawl!
We don't mind foreigners so long as you don't get into any trouble.
Don't let me see you with one of them Ruffians.
I hear war is brewing in the south, it better stay down there.
Are you a merchant?
Have you heard any news of Black Riders?
Welcome to Bree! Are you a merchant?
What business do you bring to Bree?
Nothing gets past me unseen or unheard, #p. Just so you know.
You'll be safe in Bree, #p.
Any news from the Greenway, #p?
We'll keep you safe, #p.
Stay away from them Ruffians #p, for both of our sakes.
Glad to have you in command, #p.
Together, we can make sure Bree stays proper!
We don't need Rangers to protect us, do we? No, we got this all covered. Just you and me.
I'm happy we still have decent folk like you leading the people of Bree, #p.
What is it? Ruffians? Rangers? Orcs?
You give the order, #p, we'll take care of the rest.
I'm keeping an eye out for any suspicious behaviour. You'll hear from me if I find anything.
If I could choose between following you and gate duty, well, here I am!
Proud to be at your service, sir!
Nothing to report, or are you here to report something, #p?
I will follow your orders, #p!
Are we going to tumble with them Ruffians again?
Things have been better since you've been in command, sir.
Just wondering, do we get paid by arrest, or the hour?
We ought to chase the Ruffians out of Bree!
I'll follow you to the ends of the earth, #p!
When will we return to Bree, #p? I didn't know we'd be gone for so long.
Didn't know a part of this job would be leaving Bree.
Why don't we find where those Ruffians are coming from?

conditions.biome: lotr:mordor | lotr:mordor_mountains | lotr:gorgoroth | lotr:morgul_vale | lotr:angmar | lotr:angmar_mountains

lines: I said I'd fall you until the end, but I think we're approaching that end #p.
When will we turn back, #p?
We can't keep walking through this, the air is choking!
There are foul creatures behind every corner.
We need to return to Bree!
It's hard to hold onto our hope in a place like this.
We've dealt with Ruffians like you before, #p!
A chance for the Men of Bree to show our quality!
We have been here far longer than you have, and will remain here for far longer than you will be remembered!
I knew them Rangers were worthless! No matter, I will stop you!
No need to call the guards, I am the guard!
You'd better leave these peaceful lands, Ruffian!
The barrows will soon see a new grave!
